title: "Researchers say this combo of old-school invisible ink and AI is ‘uncrackable’"
excerpt: "A team of researchers from the Harbin Institute of Technology in China have developed a system by which invisible ink and a basic cipher can be combined with relatively simple AI to create an ‘uncrackable’ offline encryption method."
